result.execSummary:
JONATHON J BOHR was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means JONATHON J BOHR was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. JONATHON J BOHR

records.addlTxt:
1:22 PM Defendant JONATHON J BOHR in court, in custody.  Attorney Carly Jo Foor Ms. in court for JONATHON J BOHR.  Prosecuting attorney Gregory A. Parker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Judge reads the complaint regarding extradition.  
Waiver of extradition.  Paperwork is submitted, signed in witness of the court.  Order signed by the Judge.

1:53 PM Defendant JONATHON J BOHR appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Carly Jo Foor Ms. in court for JONATHON J BOHR.  Prosecuting attorney Laura Nelson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Foor asks for a new date still doing research on some issues. State asks for $5000 bond with conditions. Court so orders.
Status conference scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Status conference on September 28, 2022 at 08:15 am.

3:35 PM Prosecuting attorney Laura Nelson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant JONATHON J BOHR appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Elisabeth Lynn Stockbridge appeared by video for JONATHON J BOHR.     
Atty Stockbridge has requested a copy of a report in 22CM209, so granted.  Atty Stockbridge would like to see report before she makes bond recommendations.  
Attys agree to do the next scheduling with Branch 1 off record.

1:15 pm Prosecuting attorney Laura Nelson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant JONATHON J BOHR appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Carly Jo Foor Ms. in court for JONATHON J BOHR. 
Defense requests to delay, reschedule until Monday 8-1-22.  Judge will find probable cause to continue this or will continue to sign PC statements if needed.  
Initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
